services.title: Our Adventure Services
services.description: We offer a variety of tours and activities for all skill levels. Every experience is designed to be safe, thrilling, and memorable.
services.kayaking_description: Paddle through calm waters and exciting rapids. Perfect for beginners and experts alike.
services.hiking_description: Explore scenic trails with breathtaking views. Half-day and full-day treks available.
services.biking_description: Ride thrilling bike trails through forests and challenging terrain.
services.camping_description: Experience the wilderness up close with our guided and fully-equipped camping trips.
services.rafting_description: Descend the most exciting rapids and feel the power of the river. An adrenaline-pumping adventure guaranteed.

promotions.title: Promotions and Special Offers
promotions.description: Take advantage of our seasonal deals and discounts to make your next adventure even more incredible.
promotions.summer_description: 20% off on all Kayaking and Hiking tours! Valid from June to August.
promotions.group_description: Plan an adventure with friends or family and get a 25% discount for groups of 5 or more.

about.title: About Rio Sur Adventure
about.mission_text: Our mission is to provide exceptional outdoor adventures that connect people with nature. We believe in sustainable tourism, safety, and creating memories that last a lifetime. Our team of expert guides is passionate about sharing the beauty of our region with you.
about.story_text: Founded in 2010, Rio Sur Adventure started as a small, local kayaking club. Our passion for adventure and love for the stunning southern landscapes inspired us to grow and share our experiences with the world. Today, we offer a wide range of activities, always maintaining our commitment to quality and authentic adventure.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a question or ready to book your adventure? Send us a message, and we’ll get back to you shortly.
